website_summaries.verdict: A well-made, well-balanced whisk that's comfortable to hold and use. Just be careful with the plastic components.
pros: Well-made for sauces, gravies, meringue, and batter
cons: Some of the plastic components are more delicate than expected

customer_reviews.title: First let me say I love, love
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I love, love, love Kitchen Aid products but this whisk I absolutely do not like. First one broke after about 6 months of use at the "collar" where the handle and whisk are joined, the collar just snapped. Ok, I thought I'd try again, purchased another one approx 3 months ago and wouldn't you know yesterday it did the exact same thing, the circular metal collar broke. Just normal use......
customer_reviews.author: Susan Evans

customer_reviews.title: Second one I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that the bezel is cheap plastic and broke on this second whisk I purchased (same as the first). I'm going to go with a full metal one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette C. Czmyr

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it!!!
customer_reviews.text: "KitchenAid" molded right there in the side of this piece of junk. Never would have believed it if it didn't happen to me. The plastic ring at the transition of the metal and the handle just crumbled and the whisk became useless. Have to give OXO some more business, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and loved the product until the collar broke and a big shard of it fell into the food I was making, which luckily I noticed right away and picked out. I've had it 10 months and don't even use it that often. The collar is breaking into more pieces. It feels like a cheap piece of crap. I had a no-name metal one for over 10 years that was perfect and I only replaced it because I thought this one was prettier. Now I wish I had just kept my old faithful metal one.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It's a well-built whisk except that it retains water when washed in a dishwasher. The holes where the whisk is mounted to the handle allow enough water into the whisk that it will fill up while in the dishwasher. Draining it takes some time too, and if you simply put it in a utensil drawer it will leak out onto everything else in the drawer. Other than that it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Stylish and quality. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the aqua whisk. It is very good quality. Easy to hold quality handle. Stylish color. I know it's just a whisk, but it's a great whisk. I have the matching aqua potato peeler and it is great too. Utensils you would want to sit out on your counters, they are so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy DeFoor Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of KitchenAid products! I have large appliances, small appliances, pots and pans, and utensils. So I was excited to get this little whisk, thinking it would be perfect for beating eggs and other small jobs. But after only a few uses, it broke! I haven’t had it long. The silver trim between the black handle and wire whisk is cracked and falling apart. I should add that I have a pink whisk that is the same size in our travel trailer and I’ve had that one for years with no issues. I’m hugely disappointed in this black one.
customer_reviews.author: Stone-sai4

customer_reviews.title: I bought this hoping it'd be better quality than a couple previous whisks I'd broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it'd be better quality than a couple previous whisks I'd broken. No dice. This one broke off where the handle and whisk connect after just a couple months. Save your money and buy quality tools if you're a frequent user.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A. Kilby

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this whisk back in February (it's now August of the same year) and the middle plastic piece is breaking in three different spots. I would recommending buying a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica - Wear It For Less

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAfraid it's not going to last very long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 at the same time. After 6 months of use they were both broken. We used them for eggs, batter, etc. Nothing fancy. Cleaned in dishwasher. Hoping to find some commercial grade I guess.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Mattern

customer_reviews.title: Quality Whisk
customer_reviews.text: Item came fast....You need to have your whisk!!! It is very sturdy, does the job and is easy to hold. It is a quality make and built well. Many whisks can kind of fall apart. I do not believe this one will.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but had small chip
customer_reviews.text: Whisk is very sturdy and a great addition to my kitchen. Handle had a small chip on it when I first received it. I did not want to go through the trouble of returning so I continued to use it, but it was not in perfect conditions when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a kitchen aid product and it performs as it should. It’s hard to go wrong with this company. The whisk is sturdy while still giving some bend to help curve around rounded bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Ayden Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid never fails
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected on this product brand. The handle is is long enough for me to get a good grip and it's very easy to clean. During the stay at home, this was able to make japanese souffle cakes and egg pies successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Mardy Taladro

customer_reviews.title: Its great on the first use but will always break over time.  We've had a few now.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my hand real nice. Very comfortable and works well for a roux. That said the handle tends to hold water that drips out while using and thats not good for a roux. Eventually the handle break down and it falls apart
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the end of April and three months later it’s broken. Didn’t notice until we ate the cornbread with dinner and my husband got a surprise and almost chipped his tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broken
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and broken. Always hand washed but the chrome plastic has broken off.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy, but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This whisk is a bit heavier than other options, but it is very sturdy. I have hand washed and used it several times now and it shows no signs of wear. I definitely recommend this whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Like this so much
customer_reviews.text: Works well and really good looking. Makes me happy when doing baking! Would like to have the whole collection with this color.
customer_reviews.author: Ruizhu Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to maneuver. I was mixing a heavier dough and it took care of it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Corine

customer_reviews.title: Kitchenaid Kitchen Tools the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations and MORE! Very good utensils for the kitchen. The handles are very strong and the tools are quite easy to use, they are some of the best kitchen tools I have EVER used!! The only drawback I can think of is that the handles of the tools are a bit large, more made for a man's hands then a petite woman's hands. If it were a petite woman, I would suggest checking the handle size out first. But other then that they are some of the best that I have ever used and I love the RED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JET1

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy by broke after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Silver ring around the neck and sliced my thumb open. I barely used it 3 times. When I was washing it today the silver ring around the neck broke off and sliced my finger. Other than that it is a well made. Sturdy handle. Just be careful. Also I washed this by hand. I did not put in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Donnell

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: True to the KitchenAid brand, this whisk is high quality. It can whisk something as light as eggs or heavy whipping cream to something as thick as kneading cookie dough without the wires bending. It also has withstood the heat of whisking gravy from scratch on a gas stove without bending or compromising the quality. It is dishwasher safe, as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. WifeLee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Easy to clean. Very sturdy. I've had 4 other whisks before this one. They all broke.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good product, always trusted this brand and they did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Claudzee

customer_reviews.title: Great product and color
customer_reviews.text: To get the quality you are looking for, KitchenAid is the way to go. Long lasting and sturdy. Will last many many years.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Just beat it
customer_reviews.text: Cute little whisk. Works properly and cleans really well. Easy to hold and not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good whisk
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it’s a normal whisk. We had two before (different brands) though and I put them through the mill and they broke but this one has held out longer than the other two and comfortable to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rocknerd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little whisk
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk with nice thick metal loops. I have been looking for a while and this one seems like it will hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Harv35

customer_reviews.title: Love Kitchen Aid products quality!
customer_reviews.text: Live kitchen aid it’s the best brand for kitchen ware this is a nice sturdy well made whisk love it
customer_reviews.author: Tulani

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Bought to match existing colors. I'm sure it works just as well as the $5.00 ones
customer_reviews.author: GERMAN HAMMER

customer_reviews.title: Nice whisk, holding up well after a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice whisk, holding up well after a few months of use. Kitchen utensils get a real workout around here, and I think this one will hold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: E Stock

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product & Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product and very high quality although it is slightly overpriced in my opinion. Looks great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: The Styled Life

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice, easy to hold due to slightly thicker handle, but after only three months of normal use the silver plastic ring broke. This is not at all what I would expect from this brand! Unfortuntely, I would not recommend buying this product if you really intend to use it.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: IT BROKE
customer_reviews.text: Whisk cracked after one month of light use. I have to throw it away because it’s past the 30 day return window. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to some serious whisking!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. No rusting. Easy to clean. Does not bend or become weak when using.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Kitchenaid wisk
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well made and ready to carry on the company name of quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: After years of having crappy whisks, I bought this. The price was great and it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jared McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality! Dishwasher safe definitely. Definitely worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality! Dishwasher safe definitely. Definitely worth the price. I've had it several months and used it heavily, and it still looks the same as the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time finding a whisk that wasn't too narrow or too wide or had a longer wire that got caught on things and I finally found this one! It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Shanlee

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy unlike comparable pieces at my local retailer
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy unlike comparable pieces at my local retailer, which didn't have this brand for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: P F

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than a week of use. The plastic ring attaching the whisk to the handle cracked into three pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Not your typical KitchenAid product.
customer_reviews.text: The collar is cheap plastic and it broke after a year of reasonable use. I was surprised because KitchenAid usually makes quality products.
customer_reviews.author: B. Young

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The whisk feels nice and is a KitchenAid, but after a couple of uses the metal ring around the base of the whisk broke. For such a good brand I didn't expect issues, especially so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Emily Koutsoftas

customer_reviews.title: Quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: KitchenAid quality is great. This whisk appears sturdy and easy to hold. I anticipate it will hold up for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great brand for both Kitchenaid and Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen aid is awesome brand. Easy to clean. Amazon delivered this whisk within 3 days for the difficult time. I really like it!!
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: I usually like the light and thin ones since they whisk better ...
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller and thicker than expected. I usually like the light and thin ones since they whisk better with less effort. This one is a bit rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Jae and sika

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: As a fan of cooking/baking and Kitchen Aid, I recommend! The product came fast. It fits my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Martin C

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap! Did not last 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Whisk did not last 4 months. Very cheap! Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AByxbe

customer_reviews.title: Made with cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: The cheap plastic ring around the whisk broke apart and now it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Fagan

customer_reviews.title: The best kind of egg beater!
customer_reviews.text: My eggs get nice and fluffy wuffy now and quick!
customer_reviews.author: P. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen tool ever
customer_reviews.text: This whisk is what my cooking dreams are made of. I actually put down my electric mixer to use this whisk because it is faster. Buy it, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Shane and Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Whisk
customer_reviews.text: This whisk within the second year. It looks beautiful. The one I had bought earlier had alao broken. So .. you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Osman U.

customer_reviews.title: Great product love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the aqua color and really sturdy and well built!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good for light whisking like milk or water.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a short time, went back to my cheap Jamie Oliver brand and it’s still in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sean  O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and has held together. Previous non kitchen aid whisk came apart while preparing a batter. I like the warranty that kitchenaid offers on their products.
customer_reviews.author: Vixenfairy27

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great, quality product. Very sturdy and just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Erica J. Minter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The handle is not the most comfortable but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Vitoria S O

customer_reviews.title: Broke just after return period
customer_reviews.text: It was a great whisk, until it broke 36 days after I got it. Just long enough to not be able to return.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Murphy

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: i've always wanted a real whisk and you can't go wrong with KitchenAid
customer_reviews.author: PaulaAnne E., Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Just right size for smaller amounts
customer_reviews.text: I love all kitchenaid products for its quality, design and price. This one is a smaller size whisk, very convenient to use for fast little whisking of sauses, and in smaller size bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Lyudok

customer_reviews.title: On time
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t have a chance to use it as yet but it feels light easy to hold
customer_reviews.author: lamar

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart, doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I was super disappointed with this whisk. Even with moderate use and hand washing only, it still fell apart in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The photo looked great to me but the red is cheap plastic, the kind that scratches and fades. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: VERY Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: This whisk lasted less than a month! cheap, shoddy construction. VERY Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lance Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Broke very easily. Did not even use to whisk a thick batter.
customer_reviews.author: My music

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected and will fit my baling needs perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These last a long time. Last one I had did more than 5 years of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: chris brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product it looks nice feels nice and does the job well :)
customer_reviews.author: jodalles

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made / Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Within six months of using this Kitchen Aid whisk, stress cracks appeared throughout the silver (plastic) ring which aligns the whisk prongs. The best Kitchen Aid customer service could offer was for me to ship the whisk to their warranty facility in New Jersey for replacement ... at my expense. It’s bad enough Kitchen Aid products are so poorly made. Having to go through the motions and personal expense of returning their cheaply-made products is insulting. This will be my last Kitchen Aid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marky Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Durable Whisk
customer_reviews.text: This is another classic Kitchen Aid product. It is well-made with durable components. The handle is ready to grip, and the whisk elements are sturdy enough for all normal whisking tasks. (e.g., It stirs cake batter easily without bending the whisk elements it if shape.) I would recommend it to any chef without reservation. I would not hesitate to buy another one (and accidentally did!).
customer_reviews.author: Slim2u

customer_reviews.title: Breaks far too easily
customer_reviews.text: It started out as a nice whisk, however after less than a year the silver plastic ring at the base of the whisk started to crack off and soon the whole thing will break. From other reviews it appears that this is common and that Kitchen Aid will not rectify the situation. Disappointed and would not recommend! For the record, I mostly washed the whisk by hand or in the top rack of my dishwasher. The whisk was treated with care and it still did not last.
customer_reviews.author: J & S D.

customer_reviews.title: Feels Like Quality
customer_reviews.text: The handle has weight to it. I use a silicone whisk for liquids & metal for heavier ingredients. This whisk feels like it can handle it. Really like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but will break
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for about a year of very light use, until it broke. Same place everyone else did, the plastic collar at the end of the handle that holds it all together. Not up to the quality I've experienced with their appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Junk. This whisk lasted maybe 6 months. The band is cheap plastic and broke. KitchenAid quality has gone down the tubes. So long KitchenAid. Off to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Small Time Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 16 months
customer_reviews.text: This item broke after 16 months. And I'll say that I didn't use it very much. Maybe 2 dozen times over that amount of time. The ring that holds the wires in is plastic and shattered. I ended up buying a $5 all metal one at Target. I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gulen

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk. I don't know why I didn't just ...
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk. I don't know why I didn't just buy this one first after the off-brand silicon whisk I got on here started to fall apart and the 100% metal one cut my finger. Slowly I will complete my red Kitchenaid kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Ann

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few months
customer_reviews.text: Expected better durability from a whisk from a company like KitchenAid. Only lasted a few months and then the handle broke while whisking.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haines

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this whisk
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the brand name. This is a poor quality product that will not last. Low grade plastic. Crumbled after 4 months of very lite usage (see picture)
customer_reviews.author: Yizhar Ganor

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: perfect. didn't want a big one or a small one. medium. made well too

customer_reviews.title: Poor design - breaks
customer_reviews.text: Design is poorly thought out - initial piece broke the first week. The plastic connector snapped this morning mixing pancake batter. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nick Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy this whisk is it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: oakleytiger

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and durability feels good to use looks nice too that’s always a huge plus

customer_reviews.title: Poor Durability
customer_reviews.text: The whisk broke 15 days after my return period ended :-(

customer_reviews.title: Quality whisk and fair priced
customer_reviews.text: Have used this red kitchenaid whisk for several months now and it is holding up just fine. Great quality and fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice Whisk...I Hope It Doesn't Peel or Rust!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I hope to enjoy it for many years to come. However, if the stainless-steel whisk part peels like so many others, I'll be right back here posting an update!
customer_reviews.author: appletree83

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than my last 2 whisks. Very sturdy and seems like it's made well.
customer_reviews.author: T L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Well worth the money. I love how Kitchen Aid keeps true with their colors.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality Red Handle makes it stand out in the gadget catch-all!.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality Red Handle makes it stand out in the gadget catch-all!.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this whisk. Very well made, very sturdy. Yes I would definitely recommend this whisk

customer_reviews.title: Whisked Away!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little whisk for the kitchen. I had to search for the red to go with my other utensils and was so happy to find a good one here at Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Quality good. This is a replacement for 1 that broke
customer_reviews.text: as advertised. Quality good. This is a replacement for 1 that broke. . Jurys out

customer_reviews.text: Handle already coming lose. Poor product for being a KitchenAid

customer_reviews.text: Excelent product. The shipping was very fast and the package was perfect.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. Perfect for my ccozinha . Loved it!

customer_reviews.text: I loved! The product is very good for my deserts. I search to buy kitchneid because quality.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy and does the job. I like the red handle too.
customer_reviews.author: G.F.

customer_reviews.title: Stuck Inside
customer_reviews.text: I find that foods really stick inside the whisk. My last whisk was a cheapo and nothing stuck inside the wiring. Otherwise it's study and nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

product_meta.title: KitchenAid Classic Utility Whisk, One Size, Black 2
product_meta.description: Color:Black 2The KitchenAid Utility Whisk quickly incorporates air into the ingredients for whipped cream, whipped egg whites, and light and airy frostings. The strong and durable head is constructed of stainless steel wires, and is perfect for any bowl size to assist with everyday prep tasks. The glossy ABS handle features a debossed logo, as well as an ABS satin chrome plated bolster and endcap. Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. One year hassle-free replacement and lifetime limited warranty.
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE WHISK FOR YOUR KITCHEN: This utility whisk is great for whipping meringue, blending batters, beating egg whites or keeping the lumps out of your sauces and gravies.
STAINLESS STEEL CONSTRUCTION: The strong and durable head is constructed of stainless steel wires.

ERGONOMIC HANDLE FOR COMFORT: The handle is well-balanced and ergonomically designed for comfort and smooth operation during use. The glossy ABS handle features a debossed logo, as well as an ABS satin chrome plated bolster and endcap.
DISHWASHER SAFE: This utility whisk is dishwasher safe, making clean up quick and easy.
LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY INCLUDED: This utility whisk comes with a 1-year hassle-free replacement and Lifetime Limited Warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,126 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
